action.name: Set text
action.param: "Go ahead. Quit. See if i care. *sniff*"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "i promise he has a swimming animation"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "New sprites made by SSNTails for SRB1 Christmas, which is a christmas reskin of what was left of the initial 2D SRB2 version"&newline&"(death animation is from SSNTails' sketches)"&newline&"(victory animation is from SRB1 Matrixx)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "A mix of sprites from SRB2 (pre 2.2) and Sonic X-Treme, that's because actual sprites for SRB2 weren't finished at this time and it was still in Demo phase"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "(i honestly REALLY like the designs by Meowtwo even though they're excessively pillow shaded and kinda short on animations)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "this is also the smallest skin in the game"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Unofficial edit of SSNTails' ""Srbii"" sprites, found in SRB1 TGF semi-unused"&newline&"(death animation is from SSNTails' sketches)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Unofficial edit of SSNTails' ""Srbii"" sprites, found in SRB1 TGF semi-unused, but the first appearance was in SRB1 Matrixx"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "...i dunno what to say about this one but it's ok"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "An unfinished fangame by Mach with all new levels"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "See who made it all happen (please do!)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Crawla - stupid, very poor aim, shoots tiny little slow bullets"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Super Crawla - mostly ""walks"" in Sonic's direction, same bullets as Crawla I"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Flybot - hovers around Sonic, slightly quicker bullets aimed at Sonic"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Deton - flies into Sonic and explodes, doesn't take walls into account and blows up if it hits them"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Skim - hovers over the water and drops bombs on Sonic"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Drillakilla - puts drill down and rams into sonic"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Minus - surprises Sonic from the earth and attacks him"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Capella - cute on the outside, mean on the inside?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Lagun - pops out of the lava to shoot lasers at Sonic"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Rockbot - once it sees Sonic, it destroys it's outer layer and chases after Sonic"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Crawla Commander - super fast version of the Crawla, first hit destorys its conveyer belt, meaning it hops around!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "SWATbot - same old badnik, same old AI"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Laser Cannon - not a real badnik, but a considerable threat, hovers above sonic, shoots big laser"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Ratbot - scurries along the floor and shoots Sonic with a very big gun"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "MiniBrak - a miniature BrakEggman, takes about 3 hits and has a much weaker laser and glue attack"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Bouncer - bounces around and swings + shoots his spikeball hands"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Cut grading system for SRB2 explained by Sonikku"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Some funny looking unused tiles from SRB1 and SRB2"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "An attempt to place all of the zones on one island"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "even though all of these versions were made by different people, they share remarkably similar sprites/designs for some objects"&newline& "(Original, Fiddlesticks, Special, TGF)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "What i'd assume are OCs of the devs"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "(1.5 Mach, Special Meowtwo, TGF Shadowchaos, Matrixx)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "my attempt at an edit, it didn't go very far"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "A closer look at the level, which is a part of Knothole Base 1"
